title: Just Your Teams
description: A sports news site that shows news only relevent to a sports team you select! Currently on servicing the English Premier League.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A web app that allows you to input a workout. It records the day you worked out, each exercise and it's stats!

title: Coin Finder
description: An app that utilizes foundation, Google Maps API, Google GeoLocation API and CoinMap API. Vendors who accept cryptocurrency in your search area will be displayed. My first real project I ever worked on!

title: Daily Planner
description: A simple daily planner that updates visually based on the time. It uses local storage to save your tasks that you input.
